attributes.action: Stop network rail felling 13 million trees & make them replant the same amount
attributes.additional_details: Because local councils, the media, MP's and network rail are paying no interest at all to this ecocide that will result in a faster demise of the human race
attributes.background: We support the efficient running of trains, but this is completely irresponsible when we have little time to tackle climate change, & can't wait 100 yrs for trees to grow back. This is short sighted cost cutting.  Being a major carbon sink & wildlife habitat this needs urgent reconsideration.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

Network Rail has not announced plans to fell 13 million trees, so we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.
